description: wagon pulled by oxen on arched bridge, with two figures seated in wagon, led by another figure; figures in boat, LRC; building with arched  opening at bottom at left edge
marks: Signature LRC, in the plate: [A. Canal. f.]
provenance: [Frederick Mulder Old Master & Modern Prints, London, until 1984; sold in July for PSOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1984-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: The Wagon Passing Over a Bridge, from Vedute
